itunes:summary:
Chad Robichaux, Chairman of the Board of the Save Our Allies organization, talks about what is still going on in Afghanistan to get the Americans stranded there out of the country, what he saw when he went over there to extract his former interpreter, and why the media isn’t covering the ongoing disaster.
